channel.title: CVE Feed for Sony Corporation -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Sony Corporation -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-2286|2024-08-05T13:48:05.273Z -- sony%20corporation -- nfc%20port%20software%20%28for%20rc-s310%2C%20rc-s320%2C%20rc-s330%2C%20rc-s370%2C%20rc-s380%2C%20rc-s380%2Fs%29
item.description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in NFC Port Software Version 5.5.0.6 and earlier (for RC-S310, RC-S320, RC-S330, RC-S370, RC-S380, RC-S380/S), NFC Port Software Version 5.3.6.7 and earlier (for RC-S320, RC-S310/J1C, RC-S310/ED4C), PC/SC Activator for Type B Ver.1.2.1.0 and earlier, SFCard Viewer 2 Ver.2.5.0.0 and earlier, NFC Net Installer Ver.1.1.0.0 and earlier allows an attacker to gain privileges via a Trojan horse DLL in an unspecified directory.

item.title: CVE-2018-0656|2024-08-05T03:35:48.731Z -- sony%20corporation -- the%20installer%20of%20digital%20paper%20app
item.description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in The installer of Digital Paper App version 1.4.0.16050 and earlier allows an attacker to gain privileges via a Trojan horse DLL in an unspecified directory.

item.title: CVE-2018-0600|2024-08-05T03:28:11.195Z -- sony%20corporation -- the%20installer%20of%20playmemories%20home%20for%20windows
item.description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in the installer of PlayMemories Home for Windows ver.5.5.01 and earlier allows an attacker to gain privileges via a Trojan horse DLL in an unspecified directory.

item.title: CVE-2017-2275|2024-08-05T13:48:05.214Z -- sony%20corporation -- wg-c10
item.description: WG-C10 v3.0.79 and earlier allows an attacker to execute arbitrary OS commands via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2017-2277|2024-08-05T13:48:05.108Z -- sony%20corporation -- wg-c10
item.description: WG-C10 v3.0.79 and earlier allows an attacker to bypass access restrictions to obtain or alter information stored in the external storage connected to the product via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2017-2276|2024-08-05T13:48:05.104Z -- sony%20corporation -- wg-c10
item.description: Buffer overflow in WG-C10 v3.0.79 and earlier allows an attacker to execute arbitrary commands via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2017-2287|2024-08-05T13:48:05.231Z -- sony%20corporation -- nfc%20port%20software%20remover
item.description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in NFC Port Software remover Ver.1.3.0.1 and earlier allows an attacker to gain privileges via a Trojan horse DLL in an unspecified directory.
